name: R3WIND TIME EVERYBODY
description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This Game was made for brackeys Game Jam, if this is Brackey himself reading this thank you for playing my game and i hope it makes the cut for the video :D

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

BASIC GAME RULES!!

Pick up items by holding left click on them, also the progress bars only start when the player presses the big red button.

the objective is to get you possitive comments higher than the negative once the video completion has finished thats about it enjoy :D.
